name: SLACKER (marisaofworld)
description:
This game is based around the idea of losing and finding your mind. Kaya is a trustafarian that has taken hallucinogens and his usual calming way to pass time - slack lining - has flipped to a mind-bending experience of slacking for your life over a long river of molten lava. You must balance Kaya along the line, struggling against hostile and rapidly changing winds, a constant down-pour of rocks and pink flying balls.  

CONTROLS
down arrow = crouch
left & right arrow = balance
space = change camera angle
